Adult.description: Saltmarsh Sparrows are smaller than Seaside Sparrows. They are buffier and less gray overall than Seaside Sparrows, which tend to look quite dark.
Nelson's Sparrows are smaller with a shorter bill than Seaside Sparrows. They have a buffier wash on the face and breast than Seaside Sparrows.

Adult (Belding's).description: Savannah Sparrow (Belding's) have a smaller bill than Seaside Sparrows. They tend to be paler brown overall especially on the face and neck, which are gray on Seaside Sparrows.

Adult (Savannah).description: Savannah Sparrows have a smaller bill than Seaside Sparrows. They tend to be paler brown overall especially on the face and neck, which are gray on Seaside Sparrows.

Adult.description: Song Sparrows are plumper with a rounder head and shorter bill than Seaside Sparrows.
